title: No more west
creator_credit: Nick Grinde, RKO Radio Pictures and Educational Pictures
brief_description: Starring comedian Bert Lahr who played the cowardly lion in the Wizard of Oz with Judy Garland. A comic story set in the wild wild west featuring Bert Lahr as the sheriff who finds himself unwittingly facing court for robbing a bank when he was supposed to be out catching the actual bank robbers.
